page.title: 02Brockhurst Sch'/Monks Kirby.
page.content: {Brockhurst Middle School}is a church of England school.The school has 8 teachers two of which are part_time. Mr.Woodhead is the headmaster.There are 134 children in the school. The school consists of an old section built in 1884_1885 and a new section built in 1974.The children are organised into 5 classes and at the moment classes 2 and 3 are mixed age groups.Classes 3,4 and 5 are housed in the new building where there is the Frenchroom,scienceroom and library.At the opposite end of this building are the offices,hall and kitchens. The school makes good use of its television,video,slide and film projectors,computer and various other audio visual aids.
